item.title: The Hidden Cost of ‘Fake It Till You Make It’ Leadership
item.description: Surface acting drains you, disconnects your team, and strips away your chance to lead deliberately.

item.title: How to Lead With Respect in Challenging Times
item.description: The cost of contempt in the workplace is high, but the rewards of respect are invaluable.

item.title: 7 Ways That Leaders Can Tap Into Their Inner Motivation
item.description: When motivation feels distant, you already have access to a higher gear.

item.title: How to Lead During Times of Uncertainty
item.description: If ever there was a time for leaders to prove their trustworthiness, it’s now.

item.title: Research Shows That the Best Leaders Repeat Themselves. Here’s Why You Should Too
item.description: Leaders, if you’re getting tired of saying it, that’s a sign you’re doing something right.
